CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper April 17, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Leech Farm Patients Stage 'Hobby Show' - Patients at Leech Farm Hospital staged their annual 'Hobby Show' of articles made by the patients while convalescing. In the top right photo are shown Frances Cunningham, Sam Bell, Mrs. Fox (Red Cross Gray Lady), Bernice Hill and Bill Wright, standing in front of pocketbooks, tapestries, beaded belts, dolls and other articles made by the patients... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Hospital patients and staff, Frances Cunningham, Sam Bell, Mrs. Fox, Bernice Hill and Bill Wright posed behind table with crafts during "Hobby Show" at Leech Farm
